data.textUthmani: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَٱصْطَبِرْ لِعِبَـٰدَتِهِۦ ۚ هَلْ تَعْلَمُ لَهُۥ سَمِيًّا
data.wordByWord: رَّبُّ [Lord] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [(of) the heavens] وَٱلْأَرْضِ [and the earth] وَمَا [and whatever] بَيْنَهُمَا [(is) between both of them] فَٱعْبُدْهُ [so worship Him] وَٱصْطَبِرْ [and be constant] لِعِبَـٰدَتِهِۦ ۚ [in His worship] هَلْ [Do] تَعْلَمُ [you know] لَهُۥ [for Him] سَمِيًّۭا [any similarity]
data.transliteration: Rabbu assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma faAAbudhu wastabirliAAibadatihi hal taAAlamu lahu samiyya

data.textUthmani: وَيَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوْفَ أُخْرَجُ حَيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَيَقُولُ [And says] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ [[the] man] أَءِذَا [What! When] مَا [What! When] مِتُّ [I am dead] لَسَوْفَ [surely will] أُخْرَجُ [I be brought forth] حَيًّا [alive]
data.transliteration: Wayaqoolu al-insanu a-itha mamittu lasawfa okhraju hayya

data.textUthmani: أَوَلَا يَذْكُرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ يَكُ شَيْـًٔا
data.wordByWord: أَوَلَا [Does not] يَذْكُرُ [remember] ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ [[the] man] أَنَّا [that We] خَلَقْنَـٰهُ [We created him] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] وَلَمْ [while not] يَكُ [he was] شَيْـًۭٔا [anything]
data.transliteration: Awa la yathkuru al-insanuanna khalaqnahu min qablu walam yaku shay-a

data.textUthmani: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ حَوْلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيًّا
data.wordByWord: فَوَرَبِّكَ [So by your Lord] لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ [surely, We will gather them] وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ [and the devils] ثُمَّ [then] لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ [surely, We will bring them] حَوْلَ [around] جَهَنَّمَ [Hell] جِثِيًّۭا [bent (on) knees]
data.transliteration: Fawarabbika lanahshurannahum washshayateenathumma lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jithiyya

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمْ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عِتِيًّا
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] لَنَنزِعَنَّ [surely, We will drag out] مِن [from] كُلِّ [every] شِيعَةٍ [sect] أَيُّهُمْ [those of them] أَشَدُّ [(who were) worst] عَلَى [against] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [the Most Gracious] عِتِيًّۭا [(in) rebellion]
data.transliteration: Thumma lananziAAanna min kulli sheeAAatinayyuhum ashaddu AAala arrahmaniAAitiyya

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ لَنَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيًّا
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] لَنَحْنُ [surely, We] أَعْلَمُ [know best] بِٱلَّذِينَ [[of] those who] هُمْ [[they]] أَوْلَىٰ [(are) most worthy] بِهَا [therein] صِلِيًّۭا [(of) being burnt]
data.transliteration: Thumma lanahnu aAAlamu billatheenahum awla biha siliyya

data.textUthmani: وَإِن مِّنكُمْ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَا ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتْمًا مَّقْضِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَإِن [And (there is) not] مِّنكُمْ [(any) of you] إِلَّا [but] وَارِدُهَا ۚ [(will be) passing over it] كَانَ [(This) is] عَلَىٰ [upon] رَبِّكَ [your Lord] حَتْمًۭا [an inevitability] مَّقْضِيًّۭا [decreed]
data.transliteration: Wa-in minkum illa wariduhakana AAala rabbika hatman maqdiyya

data.textUthmani: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيًّا
data.wordByWord: ثُمَّ [Then] نُنَجِّى [We will deliver] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ٱتَّقَوا۟ [feared (Allah)] وَّنَذَرُ [and We will leave] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers] فِيهَا [therein] جِثِيًّۭا [bent (on) knees]
data.transliteration: Thumma nunajjee allatheena ittaqawwanatharu aththalimeena feehajithiyya

data.textUthmani: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَىُّ ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ خَيْرٌ مَّقَامًا وَأَحْسَنُ نَدِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَإِذَا [And when] تُتْلَىٰ [are recited] عَلَيْهِمْ [to them] ءَايَـٰتُنَا [Our Verses] بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ [clear] قَالَ [say] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] لِلَّذِينَ [to those who] ءَامَنُوٓا۟ [believed] أَىُّ [Which] ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ [(of) the two groups] خَيْرٌۭ [(is) better] مَّقَامًۭا [(in) position] وَأَحْسَنُ [and best] نَدِيًّۭا [(in) assembly]
data.transliteration: Wa-itha tutla AAalayhim ayatunabayyinatin qala allatheena kafaroo lillatheenaamanoo ayyu alfareeqayni khayrun maqaman waahsanunadiyya

data.textUthmani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَحْسَنُ أَثَـٰثًا وَرِءْيًا
data.wordByWord: وَكَمْ [And how many] أَهْلَكْنَا [We destroyed] قَبْلَهُم [before them] مِّن [of] قَرْنٍ [a generation ] هُمْ [they] أَحْسَنُ [(were) better] أَثَـٰثًۭا [(in) possessions] وَرِءْيًۭا [and appearance]
data.transliteration: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin humahsanu athathan wari/ya

data.textUthmani: قُلْ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مَدًّا ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضْعَفُ جُندًا
data.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] مَن [Whoever] كَانَ [is] فِى [in] ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةِ [[the] error] فَلْيَمْدُدْ [then surely will extend] لَهُ [for him] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [the Most Gracious] مَدًّا ۚ [an extension] حَتَّىٰٓ [until] إِذَا [when] رَأَوْا۟ [they see] مَا [what] يُوعَدُونَ [they were promised] إِمَّا [either] ٱلْعَذَابَ [the punishment] وَإِمَّا [or] ٱلسَّاعَةَ [the Hour] فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ [then they will know] مَنْ [who] هُوَ [[he]] شَرٌّۭ [(is) worst] مَّكَانًۭا [(in) position] وَأَضْعَفُ [and weaker] جُندًۭا [(in) forces]
data.transliteration: Qul man kana fee addalalatifalyamdud lahu arrahmanu maddan hattaitha raaw ma yooAAadoona imma alAAathabawa-imma assaAAata fasayaAAlamoona man huwasharrun makanan waadAAafu junda

data.textUthmani: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ هُدًى ۗ وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ مَّرَدًّا
data.wordByWord: وَيَزِيدُ [And Allah increases] ٱللَّهُ [And Allah increases] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ [accept guidance] هُدًۭى ۗ [(in) guidance] وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ [And the everlasting] ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ [good deeds] خَيْرٌ [(are) better] عِندَ [near] رَبِّكَ [your Lord] ثَوَابًۭا [(for) reward] وَخَيْرٌۭ [and better] مَّرَدًّا [(for) return]
data.transliteration: Wayazeedu Allahu allatheenaihtadaw hudan walbaqiyatu assalihatukhayrun AAinda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun maradda
